item.title: MIUI OS2.0.204.0.VMWCNXM Fastboot update for Redmi Note 12R China
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi Note 12R China

Codename: sky

Version: OS2.0.204.0.VMWCNXM | 15.0

Size: 6.7 GB

MD5: ec8f9b367471ff8ef0904cf629a81de1

Changelog:
[System]
Optimization: In certain screens, larger text sizes are now supported
Updated the security patch to July 2025. Increased system security.
[Home screen]
New: Home screen icon text now displays shadows over light wallpaper areas for better readability
[Lock screen]
New: Lock screen wallpapers now support lens effect
New: Customizable Lock screen shortcuts
[Settings]
Optimization: Added a shortcut to system navigation settings in Home screen settings

Download: Here

item.title: MIUI OS2.0.206.0.VMWEUXM Fastboot update for Redmi 12 5G / POCO M6 Pro 5G EEA
item.description:
New Stable Fastboot update available!

Device: Redmi 12 5G / POCO M6 Pro 5G EEA

Codename: sky

Version: OS2.0.206.0.VMWEUXM | 15.0

Size: 7.3 GB

MD5: e3547c77213e4cb55e39587e5f09c806

Changelog:
[System animations]
Optimization: Interrupt animation when entering subpages within apps
Optimization: Interrupt animation during app transitions
[System]
New: Home screen wallpaper now supports a blur effect
Optimization: Updated styles for some classic pages
Optimization: In certain screens, larger text sizes are now supported
Updated the security patch to June 2025. Increased system security.
[Home screen]
New: Home screen icon text now displays shadows over light wallpaper areas for better readability
[Lock screen]
New: Lock screen wallpapers now support lens effect
New: Customizable Lock screen shortcuts
[Settings]
Optimization: Added a shortcut to system navigation settings in Home screen settings

Download: Here
